Posts.Content: Jan 21, 2019 06:24PM CFKelly wrote: Interestingly enough, I had the opposite problem.  I didn’t want to tell my parents.  My mom was having her own health crisis when I was diagnosed for one and my older brother died when he was 39 and that was horrible on them.  Still is.  I didn’t want to burden them with it.  Ultimately, my mom was there when my surgeon called and she found out that way.
Posts.Title: Need help on when to tell my children Toyamjj BrinkOfEternity
